setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the 'Campus Tours' link
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Campus Tours' link, navigate to the 'Admissions' disclosure button.

title: Activate a link in a dropdown in reading mode
task: Activate a link in a dropdown
setupScriptDescription: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the first link of the associated dropdown
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Overview' link, activate the link.
assertion2: Name 'Mythical University sample page content' is conveyed
